code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import'./Navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const{state,logout}=useAuth();const{user}=state;const location=useLocation();const handleLogout=async()=>{try{await logout();}catch(error){console.error('Logout error:',error);}};const isActive=path=>{return location.pathname===path;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"main-navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-brand",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"EventSync"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/dashboard')?'active':''),children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/search",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/search')?'active':''),children:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/events",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/events')?'active':''),children:"Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/saved-events",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/saved-events')?'active':''),children:"Saved"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/profile')?'active':''),children:"Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/preferences",className:"nav-link ".concat(isActive('/preferences')?'active':''),children:"Settings"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"user-email",children:user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.email})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"logout-button",children:"Logout"})]})]})});};export default Navigation;
